Description: Test login page: verify successful login with valid credentials
Steps:
1. Enter valid username
2. Enter valid password
3. Click Login
Expected result:
1. User should be able to successfully login
2. User should goto products page

Description: Test login page: verify failed login with invalid username
Steps:
1. Enter invalid username
2. Enter valid password
3. Click Login
Expected result: Error message ("Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service") should be displayed

Description: Test login page: verify failed login with invalid password
Steps:
1. Enter valid username
2. Enter invalid password
3. Click Login
Expected result: Error message ("Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service") should be displayed

Description: Test login page: verify failed login with empty username
Steps:
1. Enter valid password
2. Click Login
Expected result:
Error message ("Epic sadface: Username is required
") should be displayed

Description: Test login page: verify failed login with empty password
Steps:
1. Enter username
2. Click Login
Expected result:
Error message ("Epic sadface: Password is required
") should be displayed

Description: Test products page : verify add to cart button functionality
Steps: 1. Click on add to cart button on any one product
Expected result:
1. cart icon should have count 1
2. add to cart button should be replaced with Remove button

Description: Test products page : verify remove button functionality
Steps: 1. Click on Remove button
Expected result:
1. cart icon should not have any count
2. Remove button should be replaced with add to cart button

Description: Test products page : verify filter functionality with default filter A to Z
Expected result: All products should be sorted in A to Z with respect to product name

Description: Test products page : verify filter functionality with Z to A filter
Steps:
1. Click on filter icon
2. Select Z to A
Expected result: All products should be sorted in Z to A with respect to product name

Description: Test products page : verify filter functionality with price low to high filter
Steps:
1. Click on filter icon
2. Select price low to high
Expected result: All products should be sorted from low price to high price

Description: Test products page : verify filter functionality with price high to low filter
Steps:
1. Click on filter icon
2. Select price high to low
Expected result: All products should be sorted from high price to low price

Description: Test products page : verify cart button
Steps:
1. Add any product to cart
2. Click on cart button
Expected result: User should go to cart page

Description: Test cart page : verify remove button functionality
Steps: 1. Click on Remove button
Expected result: 1. cart should be empty

Description: Test cart page : verify continue shooping button functionality
Steps: 1. Click on Continue shopping button
Expected result: User should go to products page

Description: Test cart page : verify Checkout button functionality
Steps:
1. Add any product to cart
2. Click on cart button
3. Click on checkout button
Expected result: User should go to checkout user information page

Description: Test checkout user information page : verify successfull checkout
Steps:
1. Enter user information
2. Click on continue
Expected result: User should go to checkout overview page

Description: Test checkout user information page : verify failed checkout with empty first name
Steps:
1. Enter empty first name
2. Click on continue
Expected result: Error message ("Error: First Name is required") should be displayed

Description: Test checkout user information page : verify failed checkout with empty last name
Steps:
1. Enter empty last name
2. Click on continue
Expected result: Error message ("Error: Last Name is required") should be displayed

Description: Test checkout user information page : verify failed checkout with empty postal code
Steps:
1. Enter empty postal code
2. Click on continue
Expected result: Error message ("Error: Postal code is required") should be displayed

Description: Test Checkout overiew page : verify cancel button
Steps: 1. Click on checkout button
Expected result: User should go to products page

Description: Test Checkout overiew page : verify Finish button
Steps: 1. Click on finish button
Expected result: User should go to Checkout Complete page
